name: Shotland 2
description:
Enjoy the new recreated sprite work, revamped OST, 7 new worlds, a Boss Mode with 8 different bosses, Time Trial mode, and a Tutorial to refresh your skills!

Developed by Su5i Digital

Beta-tested by:

TheMemeDealer

Bartuik

Spoterrrp 

bluepikmin256 

Music sourced from HeatleyBros (https://youtube.com/user/heatleybros/)

PATCH NOTES:

v1.0: Game released

v1.0.1: Bug fixes

DISCLAIMER: 

- This is NOT a native Windows/macOS app, rather a port using Electron. You may encounter some glitches. 

- Mac users: you may have issues where you're getting Mac beeps while using WASD controls. Use arrow keys if possible.
